recipesJson.name: Sousweet
recipesJson.author: YourMainMatt
recipesJson.description: This is my own combination of citrus flavors. If you make, please leave a review so I can update the recipe as needed.

reviews.text: Delicious. Bright. Refreshing. A pleasure to vape. If I'm being critical, I'd say I think the recipe is a bit too front heavy, and needs a bit of balance on the body. But its simple and refreshing nature makes for a fine, fine vape. 4.5 / 5
